description: Numbers n such that n^2 + 3*n + 1 is a palindrome.
links: P. De Geest, Palindromic Quasi_Under_Squares of the form n+(n+1)^2
mathematica: palQ[n_]:=Module[{id=IntegerDigits[n^2+3n+1]},id==Reverse[id]]; Select[Range[240000], palQ] (* From Harvey P.Dale, Apr 17 2012 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: Extended and definition corrected by T. D. Noe, Apr 17 2012
